attributes.action: Tag and trace all illegal immigrants
attributes.additional_details: We urge the Government to implement a "Tag and Track" system for illegal immigrants. Many UK citizens are concerned about the impact of illegal immigration on communities and resources and how their taxes may support illegal entrants. We propose electronic monitoring to ensure compliance with immigration laws and which includes monitoring locations and real-time data. We think the proposal will ensure public safety and a system to address illegal immigration and protect citizens' rights.
attributes.background: We believe the Government response to illegal immigration has been weak. We are concerned about the illegal immigration and the lack of information about past criminal activity of some illegal immigrants in their native country. We believe enough is enough!
